mapper.select: SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt FROM stn_board WHERE private = 0 ORDER BY createAt DESC
SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt FROM stn_board WHERE idx = #{boardIdx} and private = 0
SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt, `private` as isPrivate FROM stn_board WHERE writerId = #{writerId} and private = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stn_board (title, detail, writerId, createAt, `private`) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardDetail}, #{writerId}, NOW(), #{isPrivate})
mapper.select: SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt FROM stn_board WHERE private = 0 ORDER BY createAt DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt FROM stn_board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findContent}, '%') and private = 0 ORDER BY createAt DESC
SELECT idx as boardIdx, title as boardTitle, detail as boardDetail, writerId, createAt FROM stn_board WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createAt, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} and private = 0 ORDER BY createAt DESC
